packagegui.title: Bro NSM: General Settings

field.description: Check to enable the Bro NSM.
field.sethelp: Note: If unchecked, all bro services will be disabled and stopped.

field.description: Enter the hostname or IP address of the host.

Set the right interface this bro instance will monitor to.
Hint: In most cases, you'll want to use WAN here.

Enter the IP addresses (e.g.:"10.0.0.0/8" or "fe80::/64") of the networks that Bro will consider local to the monitored environment.
Note: Put each entry on a separate line.
